trends: There has been one other sighting in Fajardo
There were no other sightings in Fajardo on or around October 20th 2001
divs: Sighting Detailshas i was awakening at the date metioned sleeping on a friends porch lol not drunken or in the effects of anything iam a naturalist vegies and fruits ,,,iwas awaken buy a friend when he was going to work 5 to 10 minutes later a got up from my deep sleep then started walking to the main gates of this expensive private ubanization in fajado puerto rico and looked up like i always do to see if its raining plus i do love to see the stars ,,wow what a display a giant aircraft i thought mmm strangeso close but no sounds weired i was statled.. it stood there like watching me,, manny light like in a v patern but the space craft or say ufo was triangular from 6 to 8 light on each side in a v shape patern.yes i was scared because i was sleeping god what did this thing do to me while sleeping then i was scared even more but i was monentarily scared , didnt last long i took a deep breath and my health was ok so i didnt even say nothing to no one because i still was grieeving my recently wife death to cancer so i smiled inside with a positive feeling that what ever it was couldent be bad for my health so i kept this infomation about my life well quiet... nbody would believe me anyhow... i just want to know what are the side effects if i was tested or used by whatever hovered over my head that early morning night ...i have a tingleing in my left upper leg and my stomach i just wondered of side effects ,, the tinggling feel like we put a cell phone to vibrate or lol is it that the cell phone is whats producing it .. take care lov always nino i will send a good drawing later ok tell me if this possible ?
Summary: sleeping in the porch , then awkening at 5am saw the tringle with lights hovering so close so big
